alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:15AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN MORA AND SOUTH CENTRAL COLFAX COUNTIES THROUGH 145 AM MDT... At 115 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Ocate, or 17 miles northwest of Wagon Mound, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Miami. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 395 and 402. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands
